attributes.action: Make Sure Armed Forces Have Equipment Appropriate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it with a personal Tax dedution of £500 a month my daughter scratches for unform and weapons - she has been seriously injured twice in the last six years (strangely enough by the service and its shortcomings)
But we stay positive - why am I buying surplus to enable her to go into combat - where has the money gone - I could kit her out on my stoppages for a month - why cant you

rejection.details: If you can amend the title this should be accepted - word order makes it difficult to understand.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
